    boolean
    SmugglersCard.apply(VoyageState state, Player p)
    Apply card effects to the player: If the power is sufficient: the player can claim the reward by losing flight days. If it's the same: nothing happens to the player, but the enemy is not defeated and goes ahead to attack the player next on the route. If inferior: The ship takes a series of hits.
    void
    StardustCard.apply(VoyageState state, Player p)
    Apply the effect of the "Stardust" card to the indicated player: If the spaceship has exposed connectors, the player will be moved back by the number of exposed connectors.
